title: Michael Cohen's Sentencing Memos & Trump's Worsening Legal Peril | Tatiana Maslany
itunes:title: Michael Cohen's Sentencing Memos & Trump's Worsening Legal Peril | Tatiana Maslany
description:
Michael Kosta angles for the unpopular job of White House chief of staff, President Trump is implicated in felonies, and Tatiana Maslany discusses "Destroyer" and "Network."
